decks.notes: The deck focuses on using Slimefoot and Squee as the commanders to create a fast-paced aggro strategy. The deck includes a variety of low-cost creatures and spells to quickly build up a board presence and deal damage to the opponent. It also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck utilizes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Skullclamp to generate additional value from sacrificing creatures. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure a consistent mana curve and access to all necessary colors. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature aggression, removal, and card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly summon powerful creatures from the graveyard using spells like Animate Dead, Reanimate, and Dance of the Dead. This Aggro deck utilizes Emet-Selch, Unsundered as the commander to take advantage of these graveyard recursion spells and overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Griselbrand, Archon of Cruelty, and Rune-Scarred Demon. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Duress, and Cabal Therapy to control the opponent's resources and protect your own game plan. By combining aggressive creatures with graveyard recursion and disruption, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent from the early turns and maintain control of the game until victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing the synergy between Slimefoot and Squee to create a fast-paced aggro strategy. The main strategy involves flooding the board with small creatures like Elves and generating value through sacrificing them with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Birthing Pod. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Pyrogoys and Opposition Agent to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized to ensure consistent access to different colors and includes utility lands like Phyrexian Tower and Pendelhaven. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures, sacrifice synergies, and disruption spells to secure a victory in the Duel Commander format.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Vohar, Vodalian Desecrator as the commander in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format. The deck is built around an aggressive playstyle, aiming to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a strong board presence. The deck includes a mix of control elements like Counterspell and Duress, along with efficient removal such as Fatal Push and Toxic Deluge. Additionally, there are powerful card advantage engines like Jace, Wielder of Mysteries and Laboratory Maniac for alternate win conditions. The inclusion of cards like Demonic Tutor and Tainted Pact ensures consistency in finding key pieces to execute the game plan effectively. Overall, the deck showcases a balance between disruption, aggression, and card advantage to secure victory.

The deck revolves around utilizing Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd as the commander to create a strong aggro strategy. The main focus is on deploying creatures quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes various utility cards such as Enlightened Tutor and Stoneforge Mystic to search for important pieces like Umezawa's Jitte and equipment. It also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Containment Priest to slow down the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Palace Jailer and Skyclave Apparition while continually pressuring the opponent with creatures like Blade Splicer and Elite Spellbinder. Overall, the strategy is to be proactive and aggressive while maintaining control of the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board using a combination of efficient creatures, counterspells, and burn spells. Spider-Man 2099 serves as the commander, providing an aggressive and evasive threat. The deck aims to quickly apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the game through counterspells like Force of Negation and Mana Leak. Burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning can take out opposing threats or finish off the opponent. The deck also includes card draw and selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency in drawing the necessary spells. Overall, the strategy revolves around quick and aggressive plays while staying ahead in card advantage and tempo.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures and efficient spells to put pressure on the opponent and win quickly. With Spider-Man 2099 as the commander, the deck includes a mix of powerful creatures like Delver of Secrets, Monastery Swiftspear, and Sprite Dragon, along with spells like Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Brazen Borrower to control the board and deal damage. The deck also includes card advantage and selection spells like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain to ensure a consistent and powerful gameplay. Overall, the strategy revolves around fast-paced aggression and tempo plays to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck revolves around utilizing Teferi, Temporal Archmage's ability to untap artifacts and lands to generate infinite mana and card advantage. It aims to control the game by countering spells, bouncing threats, and locking opponents out with cards like Stasis and Engulf the Shore. The deck includes various cantrips and card selection spells to dig for combo pieces, along with powerful artifacts like Basalt Monolith and The Chain Veil to generate mana and activate Teferi's abilities multiple times in a turn. The win condition is typically through decking opponents with Teferi's ultimate ability or casting a large Exsanguinate with all the mana generated.
